general.title: General
general.headLine: Header
general.headLineImageSubTitle: Link to an image for the background of the header
general.headLineImageGradientSubTitle: CSS Linear Gardient definition for the background image
general.headLineTimeSubTitle: Displays the time from the FHEM server in the desktop view on the left side of the header
general.headLineDateSubTitle: Displays the date from the FHEM server in the desktop view in the center of the header
general.headLineRouteSubTitle: Displays the currently selected page in the mobile view in the center of the header
general.headLineNavigationSubTitle: Displays the button for showing the navigation menu in the desktop view
general.darkModeSubTitle: Switches to the dark color scheme if the FHEM Reading value is correct
general.defaultRouteSubTitle: Shows a specific page from the navigation menu when opened
general.optionsMenuDarkModeSubTitle: Shows an option to switch to the dark or light color scheme
general.optionsMenuReloadPageSubTitle: Shows an option to reload the page
general.optionsMenuSettingsSubTitle: Shows an option to open the settings
general.optionsMenuUpdateSubTitle: Shows an option to run an update when it is available
general.optionsMenuLanguagesSubTitle: Shows an option field for switching languages

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.name: Name
navigation.optionsChips: Displays subordinate navigation points in compact form
navigation.optionsSort: Sorts subordinate navigation items in ascending order
navigation.optionsDivider: Shows a dividing line below the navigation point
navigation.optionsRows: Defines the number of columns for panels depending on the display

rules.iso639code: Input must correspond to ISO 639-1 code!

request.title: Connection to FHEM failed
request.text: Check if FHEM is reachable or if the URL connection parameters (?protocol=...&server=...&port=...&path=...) are correct, if specified.

wrongDevice.title: FHEM Config Device not found
wrongDevice.text: The FHEM device specified in the URL (http://url/index.html#/fhemappdevice/...) could not be found.

jsonParse.title: Internal error
jsonParse.text: An error has occurred while processing a JSON definition. For more information, you should activate error logging via the URL parameter (?loglevel=7).

base64.title: Internal error
base64.text: Error processing the configuration. The decoding of the base64-encoded configuration data has failed. For more information, you should activate error logging via the URL parameter (?loglevel=7).

noConfig.title: No settings found
noConfig.text: No settings have yet been made for this instance. Please make and save the basic settings for FHEMapp first.

config.title: Failed to load the configuration
config.text: No configuration data could be processed. For more information, you should activate error logging via the URL parameter (?loglevel=7).

websocket.title: WEBSocket connection failed
websocket.text: The browser used does not support WEBSocket connections. A longpoll connection to FHEM has therefore been established. To deactivate this message, you should use the URL parameter for longpoll connections (?xhr=1).

reconnect.title: Connection to FHEM was interrupted
reconnect.text: New connection attempt will be made in 3 seconds... Check whether FHEM can be reached if the error still occurs.

noPanels.title: Configuration does not contain any panels
noPanels.text: Please create panels in the FHEMapp settings first.

clipboard.text: Data has been copied to the clipboard.

checkDefs.text: Check the order of the definitions. The definition without a condition should always be at the end.
